purchaseNotice.title: Ticket Conditions
description: Conference tickets are sold on a first-come, first-served basis (based on the payment date) and may sell out early.
Payment must be completed by specified deadline for special rates to apply.
Up to 10 participants can be registered at once.
All tickets will be issued onsite on September 4, the first day of the conference.
Registering with false information can result in termination of registration.
Credit cards payments only

refundPolicy.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
description: For all cancellation and refund requests, please contact the UDC Secretariat via email. Send Email

Any refund requests submitted after Sep. 3 (Tue) will be processed after Sep. 16 (Mon)
(Refund requests will be processed in order of submission)
Refund Conditions
- May 13 ~ Aug 9: 100% refund
- Aug 24 ~ Sep 3: 80% refund
- From Sep 4: No refund

step2.title:
2. Terms and
Conditions
step2.totalAgreeCheckboxText: Agree to UDC 2019’s Privacy Policy and receive events and promotional emails (Option).
step2.checkbox1Text:
Please review the agreement(s) below and agree by selecting the checkbox(es).
You must agree with the terms of these agreements to continue.
step2.checkbox2Text:
Receive promotional e-mails (Option)

* Please agree with the terms of Promotional e-mails agreement to receive current information about UDC 2019
step2.portraitAgreement: ※ The organizer has the right to use photos and videos taken during the event publicly for different marketing and promotion purposes e.g. website. The organizer will make efforts to do so in a way that is respectful of the subjects’ wishes and privacy.

step3.title:
3. Attendee
Information
step3.noteStudent: ※Please be sure to attach a copy of your student ID card or a certificate indicating  that you are a student.
step3.alreadyRegisteredPhoneNumber: This Phone Number is already registered.

note.title: UDC 2019 <1>Blind Ticket purchase
description: Please remember your registration e-mail and password as they are required when you modify your registration information.
Up to 10 participants can be registered at a time.

We use participant information to issue your Name Tag. If buyer enter other participant’s information instead,
please enter the correct information.

When the payment process is completed, we send a registration confirm mail. Please contact UDC secretariat
if you have not received your registration confirm mail.
UDC Secretariat(E-mail: udc_reg@upbit.com)

4.title: STUDENTS
4.name: Students
4.description:
Special rates available to first 100 students
Please be sure to attach a copy of your
student ID card or certificate when
registering

includes.title: TICKET INCLUDES
description: Full access to all UDC 2019 programs, including:
All speaker presentations

Access to networking lounge, exhibition zone, and
other onsite events
Lunch and coffee break service on Sep 4 & 5
Networking dinner on Sep 4
Souvenirs
Free Wi-Fi
